thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce Will Reportedly Perform at the 2017 Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce Will Reportedly Perform at the 2017 Grammy Awards

author: Kelsey Glein
title: Pregnant Beyonce Will Reportedly Perform at the 2017 Grammy Awards
text:
by: Kelsey Glein 
If you thought you'd have to wait until Coachella to see a pregnant Beyoncé perform, think again. 
The superstar, who announced to the world yesterday that she is currently expecting twins, is reportedly set to take the stage at the 2017 Grammy Awards in just ten days, according to People . The 35-year-old revealed her family's exciting news in a gorgeous Instagram post starring her bare baby bump, and hours later posted a whole album of stunning maternity photos to her website. 
But Queen Bey won't just be performing at the annual ceremony—she also leads the pack of nominees this year, and is up for an astonishing nine awards including Record of the Year and Best Pop Solo Performance. 
VIDEO: The Internet-Breaking Beyoncé Maternity Photos
